original_text: “Who then is the faithful and wise servant, whom the master has put in charge of the servants in his household to give them their food at the proper time?
korean_text: 충성되고 지혜 있는 종이 되어 주인에게 그 집 사람들을 맡아 때를 따라 양식을 나눠 줄 자가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: Who then is the faithful and wise servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 충성되고 지혜 있는 종은 누구입니까

sentences.original_text: whom the master has put in charge
of the servants in his household
